ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Self-adaptive Mutation Rates, Novelty Search and CMA-ES
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Jeff, on the issue itself of whether SAMRs are actually useful in NS, I’d agree that more investigation is warranted, but I also think it’s important to
